metadata.name: Card Flipper
metadata.description: A set of interactive subscription cards that flip to reveal details on hover, displaying different subscription tiers.
metadata.author: Admin

html:
Card Flipper

basic
subscription

Price

$10

Details

  • Unlimited ad-free movies, TV shows, and mobile games.
  • Watch on 1 supported device at a time
  • Watch in HD
  • Download on 1 supported device at a time

standard subscription

Price

$20

Details

  • Unlimited ad-free movies, TV shows, and mobile games.
  • Watch on 2 supported device at a time
  • Watch in Full HD
  • Download on 2 supported device at a time
  • Option to add 1 extra member who doesn't live with you

premium subscription

Price

$40

Details

  • Unlimited ad-free movies, TV shows, and mobile games.
  • Watch on 4 supported device at a time
  • Watch in Ultra HD
  • Download on 6 supported device at a time
  • Option to add 2 extra member who doesn't live with you
